SA15bsa064_u:8: iṣṭasyārthasya siddhiḥ sādhanam. tasya nirvartakam aṅgam. tasya avacanaṃ tasyāṅgasyānuccāraṇaṃ vādino nigrahādhikaraṇam:

SA15bsa064_u:737: yaṃ ca svapakṣānapekṣaṃ hetuṃ prayuṅkte - 'anityaḥ śabdaḥ aindriyakatvād'; iti,

SA15bsa064_u:777: ye tu kecid vicāraprasaṅgeṣu ekatra sādhye bahavo hetava ucyante, teṣa /

SA15bsa064_u:801: yathā kvacid arthe vipratipattau prasiddhamanekārthasāmānye śabdaprayogamupadarśya pratipāditavipratipattisthānaḥ sāmānyenopasaṃharati - sarvaṃ pṛthagiti /

SA15bsa064_u:1415: so 'sthāne nirdoṣe nigrahasthānasya niyoktodbhāvayitā na bhavati tathā /
SA15bsa064_u:1416: bhūtadoṣodbhāvanalakṣaṇasyottarasyā- pratipatteritareṇottarābhāsatve pratipādite 'pratibhayaiva nigṛhīta iti nedamato nigrahasthānāntaram /
SA15bsa064_u:1418: tasya tena bhūtadoṣatve pratipādite sādhanābhāsavacanenaiva nigṛhīta iti /
SA15bsa064_u:1420: avaśyaṃ hi viṣayāntaraprāptyarthaṃ hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvena vaktavyāḥ,
SA15bsa064_u:1424: ” [nyā. sū. 5.2.24] kasyacidarthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāya pratijñātārthaviparyayāt kathāprasaṅgaṃ kurvato 'pasiddhānto vijñeyaḥ /
SA15bsa064_u:1427: iti siddhāntamabhyupetya pakṣamavasthāpayati - 'ekāntā prakṛtiḥ vyaktasya avyaktalakṣaṇā;
SA15bsa064_u:1432: sa evamuktavān paryanuyujyate - atha prakṛtirvikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣayitavyam?
SA15bsa064_u:1433: yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ,
SA15bsa064_u:1434: yat tad dharmāntaraṃ sa vikāra iti /
SA15bsa064_u:1440: pravṛttirvā- ityevaṃ pratyavasthite yadi sa sata ātmahānamasataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti,
SA15bsa064_u:1444: ito 'pi na kaścidaniyamāt kathāprasaṅgo yattenopagataṃ nāsadutpadyate na sadvinaśyati';
SA15bsa064_u:1449: sukhādīnāmutpattivināśābhyupagamābhāvāt sarvasya tadātmakasya notpatti- vināśāviti siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa064_u:1451: 91. atra taduktasya hetordoṣamanudbhāvya vikāraprakṛtilakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchan svayamayaṃ prakṛtāsambandhena aniyamāt kathāṃ pravartayati /
SA15bsa064_u:1452: tatredaṃ syād vācyaṃ - vyaktaṃ nāma pravṛttinivṛttidharmakaṃ,
SA15bsa064_u:1458: evaṃ hi tasya sādhanadoṣodbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito bhavati /
SA15bsa064_u:1463: na lokaḥ śabdairapratipāditamarthaṃ pratipattuṃ samartha iti,
SA15bsa064_u:1467: ] kathāprasaṅgāt iti idamapi hetvābhāseṣvantarbhāvāt na pṛthagvācyam /
SA15bsa064_u:1474: atrāpi yathoktatvāccintyemeva - kiṃ te yathā lakṣitaprabhedāstathaiva,
